features: Pertex Quantum® fabric is designed to protect from wind and improve the efficiency of insulation
Water-resistant Down Defender provides lightweight warmth and an extra level of moisture protection and retains critical loft of the 850-fill-power-down insulation
Smooth, curved baffles reduce down shifting while nautilus multi-baffle hood limits heat loss
Anatomically designed footbox with wrap-around construction increases warmth
Internal stash pocket; Snagless draft tube
Hand-filled and finished in Rohnert Park, CA
Materials: Pertex Quantum© 100% Nylon Ripstop 0.8 oz/ yd.
